subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Takuma Sato hit the wall on the last lap in a challenge for the lead, and Dario Franchitti won an Indy 500 that had a race-record 35 lead changes.
snippet: Takuma Sato hit the wall on the last lap in a challenge for the lead, and Dario Franchitti won an Indy 500 that had a race-record 35 lead changes.
